subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Five days after Jason Kidd decided to stay in Dallas, rejecting overtures from the Knicks, Grant Hill did the same, taking a two-year, $6.4 million deal to stay with the Phoenix Suns.
snippet: Five days after Jason Kidd decided to stay in Dallas, rejecting overtures from the Knicks, Grant Hill did the same, taking a two-year, $6.4 million deal to stay with the Phoenix Suns.
